metadata.title: CVE-2022-2588 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - high
metadata.description:
It was discovered that the cls_route filter implementation in the Linuxkernel would not remove an old filter from the hashtable before freeing itif its handle had the value 0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 5.19.0-21.21
No subscription required

No subscription required
